question:
Which of the following is/are true of bonded labor?
(1) It is forced employment in consideration of an advance or interest payment
(2) It is employment arising out of any customary or social or hereditary obligation or by reason of birth in any caste or community involved in pledging labour
(3) It is for any economic consideration involving loss of freedom of contract leading to forced employment
Choose the correct answer from the codes given below:
explanation: Also known as debt bondage, bonded labor is a specific form of forced labor in which compulsion into servitude is derived from debt. Child labor, agricultural debt bondage, and bonded migrant labor are persistent forms of modern slavery that fall under the Indian constitutional definition of forced labor.
